name: Darkstep
description: Hard, uptempo and uses heavy breakbeats, Post-Industrial-influenced sound design, and horror movie samples to create a sinister, claustrophobic atmosphere.

children.name: Crossbreed
children.description: Harsh and dense mixture of Darkstep with Hardcore [EDM] developed in the late 2000s.

children.name: Crossbreed
children.description: Harsh and dense mixture of Darkstep with Hardcore [EDM] developed in the late 2000s.

children.name: Skullstep
children.description: Repetitious, aggressive, off-beat rhythms often programmed using distorted, harsh, and noisy percussion that usually resembles clangy "pots and pans", machine gun-like snares.
